flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to stay 1000*0.2=<<1000*0.2=200>>200 pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under 1000-200=<<1000-200=8000>>8000 pounds
That means he can put 8000-250=<<8000-250=7750>>7750 pounds on the bar
#### 7750

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
